## AsyncMethodReturns type

Given a type of object with methods, make some (or all) of the return values "async" (i.e., returning a `string` becomes returning a `Promise<string>`<!-- -->).

All non-function properties are excluded from the resultant type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type AsyncMethodReturns<T, K extends keyof T = keyof T> = {
    [KK in K]: T[KK] extends (...args: any[]) => PromiseLike<any> ? T[KK] : T[KK] extends (...args: infer A) => infer R ? (...args: A) => Promise<R> : T[KK];
};
```

## Example


```ts

interface User {
  isAdmin: boolean; // will not be included
  login(): boolean;
  resetPassword(): string;
  sendEmail(body: string): boolean;
}
const x: AsyncMethodReturns<User> ...; // {
                                       // login(): Promise<boolean>,
                                       // resetPassword(): Promise<string>
                                       // }

```
